Key Match Events: The Yankees finished off the Guardians with a 5-2 victory in Game 5 of the ALCS.
Giancarlo Stanton hit four home runs en route to ALCS MVP.
Juan Soto hit a tiebreaking three-run 10th-inning home run to clinch the Yankees' first pennant since 2009.
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed that the victory was special and reflected on the hard work and disappointment from the previous season.
Judge mentioned the importance of overcoming tough times and building trust within the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees missed the playoffs completely last season.
The three games played at Progressive Field were all decided in the winning team's final at-bat.
